entry.title: Thoothukudi macroon - தூத்துக்குடி மக்ரூன்ஸ்
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gnanam Bakery
Type: Non-Veg
Price: 180.00

**This product contains Egg  and cannot be shipped to EU and UK**

Thoothukudi Macaroon - Authentic South Indian Sweet

Thoothukudi Macaroons are a delightful and distinctive sweet treat originating from the coastal town of Thoothukudi in Tamil Nadu, India. Unlike traditional macaroons, Thoothukudi Macaroons are made with cashew nuts, sugar, and egg whites, creating a unique blend of crunchy and chewy textures. Their preparation involves meticulous handcrafting techniques passed down through generations, ensuring each macaroon embodies the authentic taste and tradition of South India. The use of high-quality cashew nuts gives them a rich, nutty flavor that sets them apart from other macaroons.

Ingredients 

Cashew, Egg White, Powdered Sugar.

Serving Guide 

Store in an airtight container to maintain crispness.

Shelf Life:

Enjoy the freshness for up to 15 days.

Why Buy Thoothukudi Macaroons from Pettikadai

At Pettikadai, we are committed to bringing you the finest traditional sweets with an emphasis on authenticity and quality. Here’s why you should choose our Thoothukudi Macaroons:

  1. Freshness Guaranteed: We ensure that our macaroons are freshly made and packed to preserve their delightful flavor and texture.
  2. Customer Satisfaction: Our customers' satisfaction is our top priority. We strive to provide exceptional service and ensure that every bite of our Thoothukudi Macaroons brings joy to your taste buds.

 Experience the authentic taste of Thoothukudi with our delicious macaroons, made with love and tradition. Order now and indulge in this delightful South Indian treat!

 

Check out our other traditional sweets like Kovilpatti Kadalai Mittai.

entry.title: Butter Biscuit-வெண்ணை பிஸ்கட்
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gnanam Bakery
Type: Veg
Price: 250.00

This product contains Dairy items and cannot be shipped to EU and UK

This product is not eligible for one-day delivery

 

"A tea shop favorite through out south india, these delicate and crisp butter cookies are the real deal. To get a hint what the fuss is all about, take a bite of these flaky goodness with a sip of tea. You will hardly be able to stop yourself."

வெண்ணெய் என்றதும் கண்ணனே நம் நினைவில் நிற்பார். தயிர் கடைகையில் , திரண்டு வரும் வெண்ணெயின் வாசமும், சுவையும் நம்மை விட்டு எளிதில் நீங்காது. மருத்துவ குணம் நிறைந்த வெண்ணெயில் தயாரிக்கப்படும் வெண்ணெய் பிஸ்கட் நாவில் கரைந்து நம்மில் என்றும் நிறைந்திருக்கும்

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

15 days

entry.title: Tea Rusk (Nuts Rusk)-டீ ரஸ்க்
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gnanam Bakery
Type: Veg
Price: 270.00

This product is not eligible for one-day delivery

This product contains Dairy items and cannot be shipped to EU and UK

An ideal tea time accompaniment, these double baked biscuits are made of wheat and milk. Specially made in the renowned Gnanam bakery of Tuticorin, the Tea rusk remains fresh for 15 days from the date of manufacture and make for an ideal baby food during the teething stage.

உலகின் சிறந்த உணவு ஜோடிகள் டீயும்-ரஸ்க்கும்தான். கோதுமை மற்றும் பாலில் செய்யப்படும் ரஸ்க் மொறுமொறுப்பானது. அலுவலகங்களின் டீ-பிரேக் நேரங்களில் டீயுடன் ரஸ்க் எடுத்துக்கொள்வது மன அழுத்தத்தை குறைக்கிறது.

INGREDIENTS 

Wheat, Cane Sugar, Vegetable Shortening, Milk Products, Yeast

SERVING GUIDE

Store in an airtight container

SHELF LIFE

20 days
